trans-unit.source: Explore Java trace logs in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Explore Java trace logs in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Search Log4J or Logback traces in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Search Log4J or Logback traces in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Explore Java trace logs in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Explore Java trace logs in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: If you're using Logback or Log4J (v1.2 or v2.0) for tracing, you can have your trace logs sent automatically to Application Insights where you can explore and search on them.
trans-unit.target: If you're using Logback or Log4J (v1.2 or v2.0) for tracing, you can have your trace logs sent automatically to Application Insights where you can explore and search on them.

trans-unit.source: Install [Application Insights SDK for Java][java], if you haven't already done that.
trans-unit.target: Install [Application Insights SDK for Java][java], if you haven't already done that.

trans-unit.source: Add logging libraries to your project
trans-unit.target: Add logging libraries to your project

trans-unit.source: Choose the appropriate way for your project.
trans-unit.target: Choose the appropriate way for your project.

trans-unit.source: If your project is already set up to use Maven for build, merge one of the following snippets of code into your pom.xml file.
trans-unit.target: If your project is already set up to use Maven for build, merge one of the following snippets of code into your pom.xml file.

trans-unit.source: Then refresh the project dependencies, to get the binaries downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Then refresh the project dependencies, to get the binaries downloaded.

trans-unit.source: If your project is already set up to use Gradle for build, add one of the following lines to the `dependencies` group in your build.gradle file:
trans-unit.target: If your project is already set up to use Gradle for build, add one of the following lines to the `dependencies` group in your build.gradle file:

trans-unit.source: Then refresh the project dependencies, to get the binaries downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Then refresh the project dependencies, to get the binaries downloaded.

trans-unit.source: Download and extract the appropriate appender, then add the appropriate library to your project:
trans-unit.target: Download and extract the appropriate appender, then add the appropriate library to your project:

trans-unit.source: Add the appender to your logging framework
trans-unit.target: Add the appender to your logging framework

trans-unit.source: To start getting traces, merge the relevant snippet of code to the Log4J or Logback configuration file:
trans-unit.target: To start getting traces, merge the relevant snippet of code to the Log4J or Logback configuration file:

trans-unit.source: The Application Insights appenders can be referenced by any configured logger, and not necessarily by the root logger (as shown in the code samples above).
trans-unit.target: The Application Insights appenders can be referenced by any configured logger, and not necessarily by the root logger (as shown in the code samples above).

trans-unit.source: Explore your traces in the Application Insights portal
trans-unit.target: Explore your traces in the Application Insights portal

trans-unit.source: Now that you've configured your project to send traces to Application Insights, you can view and search these traces in the Application Insights portal, in the [Diagnostic Search][diagnostic] blade.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've configured your project to send traces to Application Insights, you can view and search these traces in the Application Insights portal, in the [Diagnostic Search][diagnostic] blade.

trans-unit.source: In the Application Insights portal, open Diagnostic Search
trans-unit.target: In the Application Insights portal, open Diagnostic Search
